lead_paragraph: In the first 106 years of the United States Women’s Amateur, no preteen had reached match play. Now there are two, and they will face each other today. Alexis Thompson of Coral Springs, Fla., and Pearl Jin of San Gabriel, Calif., both 12, ousted older opponents to set up their second-round showdown at the Crooked Stick Golf Club in Carmel, Ind.
